Plot: Twin brothers are unknowingly separated at birth; one of them becomes an iconic rock 'n' roll star, while the other struggles to balance his love for music and pleasing his father.
Title: The Identical
Actors: Ray Liotta, Ashley Judd, Seth Green, Joe Pantoliano
tomatoConsensus: With nearly every element ringing as hollow as the ersatz Elvis at the story's core, The Identical looks destined for a bright future on the ironic viewing circuit.
